 import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { Movie } from '../../models/movie'; @Component({ selector: 'app-item', templateUrl: './item.component.html', styleUrls: ['./item.component.scss'] }) export class ItemComponent { @Input() itemData: Movie | null = null; }
